title: Landlord Not Returning Security Deposit
description: When your landlord refuses to return security deposit after you vacate the rental property or makes unreasonable deductions

rights.title: Right to Return of Security Deposit
rights.description: Tenants have the right to get back their security deposit after vacating, minus legitimate deductions

rights.title: Right to Detailed Account of Deductions
rights.description: Right to receive itemized list of any deductions from security deposit with supporting evidence

rights.title: Right to Interest on Deposit
rights.description: In some states, tenants have right to interest on security deposit held for extended periods

actionSteps.title: Gather Deposit Documentation
actionSteps.description: Collect receipt of security deposit payment, rental agreement, and move-in/move-out inspection reports

actionSteps.title: Send Formal Demand Letter
actionSteps.description: Send written demand for return of security deposit with supporting documents

actionSteps.title: Send Legal Notice
actionSteps.description: If landlord doesn't respond, send legal notice through lawyer demanding deposit return

actionSteps.title: File Small Cause Court Case
actionSteps.description: File suit in small cause court or consumer court for recovery of deposit with damages

sources.title: Indian Contract Act, 1872 - Bailment
sources.authority: Legislative Department, Ministry of Law and Justice

variations: Landlord not returning my advance money
Landlord making false deductions from deposit
Not getting advance back after vacating
Security money not refunded by owner
